import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-stylebinding', templateUrl: './stylebinding.component.html', styleUrls: ['./stylebinding.component.css'] }) export class StylebindingComponent { nome:String='Tim' idade:number=26 }
